channel.title: Fede’s intern 🥊 / @fede_intern
channel.description: Twitter feed for: @fede_intern. Generated by nitter.freedit.eu

item.title:
The US is having the same issues that governments from developing countries. We’re literally building solutions like this one for these countries.
The US can’t even trust its own bureaucrats nowadays. Part of what made the US so powerful is that it’s bureaucracy went to WWII and they were prepared to do do anything.
item.dc:creator: @fede_intern
item.description:
The US is having the same issues that governments from developing countries. We’re literally building solutions like this one for these countries.

The US can’t even trust its own bureaucrats nowadays. Part of what made the US so powerful is that it’s bureaucracy went to WWII and they were prepared to do do anything.

nitter.freedit.eu/KobeissiLetter/status/1888378578745852127#m

item.title:
Congrats @udiWertheimer, @ercwl and @TaprootWizards for the raise! I believe it’s crucial for Bitcoin to keep innovating and improving itself. Taproot Wizards is not only a company to me, but a movement trying to do so.
I also think Ethereum needs a strong Bitcoin builder community: crypto can’t win if Bitcoin doesn’t win. Ethereum needs Bitcoin succeeding. I don’t see Bitcoin as an adversary in any way.
item.dc:creator: @fede_intern
item.description:
Congrats @udiWertheimer, @ercwl and @TaprootWizards for the raise! I believe it’s crucial for Bitcoin to keep innovating and improving itself. Taproot Wizards is not only a company to me, but a movement trying to do so.

I also think Ethereum needs a strong Bitcoin builder community: crypto can’t win if Bitcoin doesn’t win. Ethereum needs Bitcoin succeeding. I don’t see Bitcoin as an adversary in any way.

item.title:
RT by @fede_intern: 2/ Software engineers were top of the world from 2000-2020
But the easy path to wealth for the median software engineer is over
There were 100k+ people laid off from big tech in 2024, with more layoffs coming. Remote work has globalized salaries, AI is automating more jobs.
item.dc:creator: @avichal
item.description:
2/ Software engineers were top of the world from 2000-2020

But the easy path to wealth for the median software engineer is over

There were 100k+ people laid off from big tech in 2024, with more layoffs coming. Remote work has globalized salaries, AI is automating more jobs.

item.title:
RT by @fede_intern: I have a ton of respect for Qiao, but strongly disagree:
- $42B TVL on L2s (vs. $9B on Solana) - 400 UOPS (400% YoY increase) - 8.3M active addresses (250% YoY increase) - 17m tx count (400% YoY increase) - 56% of all transactions on Solana are pumpfun, sure, if you’re building for memecoin traders
Yeah, I think L2s are doing just fine, and I highly recommend builders build on L2s.
item.dc:creator: @fabdarice
item.description:
I have a ton of respect for Qiao, but strongly disagree:

- $42B TVL on L2s (vs. $9B on Solana)
- 400 UOPS (400% YoY increase)
- 8.3M active addresses (250% YoY increase)
- 17m tx count (400% YoY increase)
- 56% of all transactions on Solana are pumpfun, sure, if you’re building for memecoin traders

Yeah, I think L2s are doing just fine, and I highly recommend builders build on L2s.

item.title:
RT by @fede_intern: really cool idea from the gigabrains at gwyneth
tl;dr ULTRA TX is a big fat transaction placed at the top of L1 blocks by the builder
it bundles all L1 transactions into one, which would make the L1 more programmable and improve composability with L2s
read on
item.dc:creator: @arixoneth
item.description:
really cool idea from the gigabrains at gwyneth

tl;dr ULTRA TX is a big fat transaction placed at the top of L1 blocks by the builder

it bundles all L1 transactions into one, which would make the L1 more programmable and improve composability with L2s

read on

item.title: RT by @fede_intern: Massive milestone achieved by the Linea team. Prover completeness represents another signpost in the rearview mirror, as the Linea Technology and the Linea Ecosystem keep rolling down the road of toward highest performance and progressive decentralization.
item.dc:creator: @ethereumJoseph
item.description:
Massive milestone achieved by the Linea team. Prover completeness represents another signpost in the rearview mirror, as the Linea Technology and the Linea Ecosystem keep rolling down the road of toward highest performance and progressive decentralization.

item.title:
RT by @fede_intern: one of the main issues is that following the based, preconfs and native rollups conversations it's hard for the general public.
there is a huge need for simple and concrete content explaining the concepts and how all the pieces fit together.
item.dc:creator: @rj_aligned
item.description:
one of the main issues is that following the based, preconfs and native rollups conversations it's hard for the general public.

there is a huge need for simple and concrete content explaining the concepts and how all the pieces fit together.

item.title:
Believe in love and optimism, especially when you’ve been knocked down.
Stand by your friends and cherish true friendship.
Fight for your ideals. Be ruthless.
item.dc:creator: @fede_intern
item.description:
Believe in love and optimism, especially when you’ve been knocked down.

Stand by your friends and cherish true friendship.

Fight for your ideals. Be ruthless.

item.title:
Top chinese talent is starting to stay in their country. I’m a huge fan of Tsinghua university for example.
The same is going to happen with the bright Indian brothers. I’m very bullish their country too long term.
I’m happy that talent can stay in its own country working on global scale problems.
item.dc:creator: @fede_intern
item.description:
Top chinese talent is starting to stay in their country. I’m a huge fan of Tsinghua university for example.

The same is going to happen with the bright Indian brothers. I’m very bullish their country too long term.

I’m happy that talent can stay in its own country working on global scale problems.

item.title: Today I had a very productive day. Working and fasting since 9 AM to now. Celebrating with a great chinese dinner.
item.dc:creator: @fede_intern
item.description: Today I had a very productive day. Working and fasting since 9 AM to now. Celebrating with a great chinese dinner.

item.title:
RT by @fede_intern: haha. thanks for all your support.
yes, the crypto gambling markets won’t understand
but we will build real products on top of our infra, like the camera, and music player of the iPhone, that people will like it because it adds value to them (they might not even know web3 aspects of it).
item.dc:creator: @shresth3103
item.description:
haha. thanks for all your support.

yes, the crypto gambling markets won’t understand

but we will build real products on top of our infra, like the camera, and music player of the iPhone, that people will like it because it adds value to them (they might not even know web3 aspects of it).

item.title: Greece and Turkey have amazing engineering talent that is badly employed. Gonna go more often there to the universities to meet with professors and students.
item.dc:creator: @fede_intern
